description technical detail:
Acer V246HL 24 VGA DVI Monitor with Speakers
Explore the angle thats perfect for you with this Professional Series monitor, which tilts, swivels, pivots and adjusts for height to achieve the optimal position for extended viewing. Its ergonomic design provides handsome style on your desk - or off: this monitor is wall mountable, giving you clear views with more room. The contrast ratio of the monitor is superior and the response is ultra-quick. In-Plane Switching (IPS) technology delivers consistent viewing across wide angles, faster response time for reduced eye strain, more realistic colors, and a stable view that prevents tailing when the screen is touched. Moreover, the monitor allows you to connect to a wide variety of useful devices including notebooks, tablets and giant screen TVs, thanks to helpful VGA, DVI, HDMI, USB and even DisplayPort connectivity options. Professional Series monitors are mercury free. In addition, youll see power savings of up to 68% thanks to advanced Acer EcoDisplay technologies and white LED backlighting, which cut your costs and conserve the earths resources. Acer also uses recyclable packaging to further reduce ecological impact.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately), wall mountable
